text.0:
It's been claimed that challenging someone for not wearing a face mask is a breach of the Equality Act, and could result in a fine.

This is not the case, although the government has said people who are exempt do not need to prove this if challenged.

https://t.co/AGQNVOXnJZ
text.1:
Go into the weekend well informed with a three minute blast of our independent, impartial fact checks ▼

https://t.co/589zhmNr0o
text.2:
We checked a claim that a “second wave” of Covid-19 is actually just a normal cold and flu season.

There’s good evidence that Covid-19 cases are rising in the UK. These aren’t just colds or flu being mistaken for coronavirus.

https://t.co/iN6GNAZMAj
